Add your game

This is the eighth dedicated Ludum Dare roundup for Haxe. Ludum Dare 36 took place between August 26th and 29th with the chosen theme being Ancient Technology.

Haxe

  • R. Lastey, archaeologist by Aurel Bílý.
  • The Machine by jeremyfa.

OpenFL

  • Steaming by David Durham.

HaxeFlixel

  • Atlantis by yben.
  • Circuitry by btwj_.
  • Cultivate by ruthiepee.
  • Dizzy Mayan by aschab.
  • Father of Time by dkdwrek.
  • Force of Wheel by qzqxq.
  • LD36 by Joff.
  • Leonardo's Painting Machine by Frozen Fractal.
  • No Touch by aeveis.
  • pls get cool by andromalin.
  • Raiders of the Ancient Technology by runvs.
  • Steam Train Youpi by Sébastien Bernery.
  • Wild West Hero by chocobyte.
  • Spear the sun by lightsoda.
  • Baba Yaga by runedrake.
  • Mr. BigCash by scorched.

Luxe Engine

  • Four by Rudenko.

Stencyl

  • A Decent Game With A Great Soundtrack by xWarZonex.
  • Candle Dungeons by Donni11.
  • Gear Kitty by Raiyumi.
  • Loire Dragon - draft 0.0.1a by ElBart.37fr.
